events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I need to return it because it doesn't fit well. How can I get a refund for this item?
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to keywords about returning the item and requesting money back.
Assigning this refund request case to the returns department for further handling and customer assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with the return process and ensure you get your refund smoothly.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm the condition of the jacket? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 54321 and the jacket is unused, still with the tags attached as when it arrived.
Thank you for the info. You can ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once we receive it, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Great, that sounds straightforward. I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions.
I have sent you the return label by email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the return label and that your refund is progressing without any issues.
Since the refund was processed successfully and no further concerns were raised, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
